name: Protocol: U
description:
Hell is empty and all the devils are here

Chase has always been on the wrong side of luck. First she lost her job, next she lost her home and then the claims on her implants. As she struggles to survive with her failing implants, she suddenly gets details of a job unlike any she knows and when her implants start failing starting with her audio , she takes the leap of faith.

 Investigate the Uvir Berovith Mansion

It wasn't an easy job by any means but she thought that it shouldn't that much of a big deal. The mansion had fallen out of use years ago and the only thing between her were those green metal bots.

That's what she thought...

This is a very early prototype of the game that only includes the first level and serves as only an example of what game play will be like. It is hence short in length. The game will have an overarching story and takes a lot of inspiration from old school fps games as well as horror games and has art akin to that.

Controls (In game):

WASD- move

LMB- shoot

E- Interact

M- Quit to Main menu

R- Reset Level

ESC- Pause Game
